name: Splunk_Search_IP_Logs
author: Unit777
description: Searches for hits in Splunk IP logs for past 30 days

config.filter_expression: | eval time=strftime(_time, "%y-%m-%d") | eval src_ip=if(isnull(src_ip), "-",src_ip) | eval src=if(isnull(src), "-",src) | eval Event=src_ip."^".src."^".time |dedup src |stats count, values(Event) as Events by src_ip | table *
